system.description:
An enchantment which causes a single plant to grow in a particular configuration. The enchantment could, for example, be used to shape a tree to look like a person, or, with multiple castings, to make a row of bushes weave themselves into a tight hedge/wall.

The enchantment does not speed growth. The enchantment only works on a plant that is alive. Multiple castings are generally necessary because of the short Duration.

 

Bonus Effects

CML60+Enchantment may be laid upon an animal. It can only work, however, when the animal is growing. Multiple castings are nearly always necessary to achieve noticeable results.

 

Time: 15-CSI hours

Range: Touch

Duration: CSI-10 days
